channel.title: Chassy or someone that really knows coding please help
channel.description:
alright so you know the greeting screen that you get when you first log in, the one that you have to close before you can move/adventure the server, well i really want to change it but i keep looking for the writing and i cant seem to come across it what it sais now is...
(update)
in green right in the middle of the screen, any ideas?

item.title: Chassy or someone that really knows coding please help
item.dc:creator: @Xacoda Xacoda
item.description:
@Xacoda wrote:

Well, I don’t fully understand u but do this–

go to NPCHandler.java - cntrl+f search for “Welcome to [example]scape!” change the example/what ever it has there to your server name then for changing the log in .txt go to client.java cntrl+f search for “welcome to [example]scape” then do the save then compile server.

hope it helped, Xacoda~

Read full topic
item.source: Chassy or someone that really knows coding please help

item.title: Chassy or someone that really knows coding please help
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

Either go to client.java and hit ctrl+F and search for the server name and chnage it to yours
or find server.java and do the same…
Hope this helped

Read full topic
